name: Hurricane | Developed
description:
This is a collaborative creation by DEVELOPED: Skiddlz, AlfredPudding, Max Savage, Graham, and folkart. 
This is based off of the cocktail the hurricane, a fresh tropical concoction that is just as delightful as the real deal. Full Development Notes on DEVELOPED Ep. 4 https://youtu.be/qeWQsaLEaVE

Our weekly episodes will be released at 6:00pm EST every Tuesday, and catch our live shows every Thursday at 6pm EST https://www.youtube.com/c/developedDIY
author: Developed

reviews.text: Just mixed this up and this tastes and smells incredible. It is amazing how that little amount  of pomegranate turns into grenadine on this mix.  This is very very very good.
